data.meaning: adj. 径直的、直接的、直系的

app_sentences.en: Can you direct me to the nearest bookstore, please?
app_sentences.cn: 请问你能告诉我最近的书店怎么走吗？

data.meaning: n. 飞行员、领航员、引水员vt.驾驶(飞机等)

app_sentences.en: My dream is to become a pilot and fly a big airplane.
app_sentences.cn: 我的梦想是成为一名飞行员，驾驶大飞机。

data.meaning: vi. (～ in) 成功v.继...之后、继任、继承

app_sentences.en: If you work hard, you will succeed in the final exam.
app_sentences.cn: 如果你努力学习，你会在期末考试中取得成功。

app_sentences.en: If you work hard, you will succeed in achieving your dreams.
app_sentences.cn: 如果你努力，你就会成功实现梦想。

app_sentences.en: Our flight to Beijing will take off at three o'clock this afternoon.
app_sentences.cn: 我们飞往北京的航班将在今天下午三点起飞。

app_sentences.en: The football match was cancelled because of the heavy rain.
app_sentences.cn: 足球赛因为大雨被取消了。

app_sentences.en: What exactly do you want to do this weekend?
app_sentences.cn: 你这个周末到底想做什么？

app_sentences.en: Please take care of your little sister when mom is out.
app_sentences.cn: 妈妈不在家的时候请照顾好你的妹妹。

data.meaning: n. 先生、阁下、(对爵士或男爵前的尊称)爵士

app_sentences.en: Excuse me, sir, you dropped your wallet on the floor.
app_sentences.cn: 先生，打扰一下，您的钱包掉在地上了。

data.meaning: n. 政府官员、军官、警官

app_sentences.en: The police officer helped us find the way to the museum.
app_sentences.cn: 那位警察帮助我们找到了去博物馆的路。

data.meaning: adj. 愚蠢的、麻木的、乏味的

app_sentences.en: It is stupid to go out without a coat on such a cold day.
app_sentences.cn: 这么冷的天不穿外套就出去是很愚蠢的。

app_sentences.en: Please fasten your seat belt before the plane takes off.
app_sentences.cn: 请在飞机起飞前系好安全带。

app_sentences.en: It's cold outside, so remember to wear your jacket.
app_sentences.cn: 外面很冷，记得穿上你的夹克。

app_sentences.en: Put on your jacket; it's a bit cold outside this morning.
app_sentences.cn: 穿上你的夹克；今天早晨外面有点冷。

app_sentences.en: He put on his jacket and went out to play with his friends.
app_sentences.cn: 他穿上夹克，然后出去和朋友玩了。

app_sentences.en: Their house is big, but ours is closer to the school.
app_sentences.cn: 他们的房子很大，但我们的离学校更近。

app_sentences.en: This blue bike is ours, and that red one belongs to Tom.
app_sentences.cn: 这辆蓝色的自行车是我们的，那辆红色的是汤姆的。

app_sentences.en: My father wears a tie to work every day.
app_sentences.cn: 我爸爸每天系着领带去上班。

app_sentences.en: We sit in the front row during the school assembly.
app_sentences.cn: 在学校集会时我们坐在前排。

app_sentences.en: We sat in the front row to watch the school play.
app_sentences.cn: 我们坐在前排观看学校话剧。

app_sentences.en: In summer, we often go swimming in the swimming pool near my home.
app_sentences.cn: 夏天，我们经常去我家附近的游泳池游泳。

app_sentences.en: Children are not allowed to swim in the pool without adults.
app_sentences.cn: 没有大人陪同，孩子们不允许在游泳池里游泳。

app_sentences.en: I hope I can pass all my subjects this term.
app_sentences.cn: 我希望这学期我能通过所有科目。

app_sentences.en: Please pass the salt to me during dinner.
app_sentences.cn: 请吃饭时把盐递给我。

app_sentences.en: I hope to pass all my exams at the end of this term.
app_sentences.cn: 我希望在这学期末通过我所有的考试。

data.meaning: adj. 次要的、二级的、中级的

app_sentences.en: Playing games is secondary; studying is your main job now.
app_sentences.cn: 玩游戏是次要的；学习是你现在的主要任务。

app_sentences.en: My brother will go to secondary school next September.
app_sentences.cn: 我哥哥明年九月将要去上中学。

data.meaning: adj. 不在的、缺席的、缺少的

app_sentences.en: He was absent from school yesterday because he had a bad cold.
app_sentences.cn: 他昨天缺课了，因为他得了重感冒。

app_sentences.en: She was absent from school yesterday because she had a fever.
app_sentences.cn: 她昨天因为发烧没来上学。

app_sentences.en: The bell rings at eight o'clock, and our class begins.
app_sentences.cn: 铃声在八点响起，我们的课就开始了。

data.meaning: adj. 富有的、丰裕的、充分的n.富人

app_sentences.en: The wealthy man donated a lot of money to build a new library.
app_sentences.cn: 那个富人捐了很多钱来建一座新图书馆。

app_sentences.en: Many children fear the dark and like to sleep with a light on.
app_sentences.cn: 许多孩子害怕黑暗，喜欢开着灯睡觉。

app_sentences.en: Some children have a fear of speaking in front of the class.
app_sentences.cn: 有些孩子害怕在全班面前讲话。

data.meaning: 过去经常(做)...、过去有规律地发生

app_sentences.en: I used to play basketball after school, but now I prefer swimming.
app_sentences.cn: 我过去常常放学后打篮球，但现在我更喜欢游泳。

app_sentences.en: Health is more important than wealth for most people.
app_sentences.cn: 对大多数人来说，健康比财富更重要。

data.meaning: n. 两倍、[计] 双精度型adj.两倍的、双重的vt.使加倍vi.加倍

app_sentences.en: This math problem is double the difficulty of the last one.
app_sentences.cn: 这道数学题的难度是上一道的两倍。

app_sentences.en: We need a double room for my parents when they visit us.
app_sentences.cn: 我父母来看我们时我们需要一个双人间。

app_sentences.en: My father is very busy, so he seldom watches TV.
app_sentences.cn: 我爸爸很忙，所以他很少看电视。

app_sentences.en: He is very busy and seldom has time to watch TV.
app_sentences.cn: 他非常忙，很少有时间看电视。

data.meaning: adj. 多余的、剩下的、高而瘦的人的

app_sentences.en: I always carry a spare pen in my school bag.
app_sentences.cn: 我总是在书包里带一支备用钢笔。

app_sentences.en: I often read books in my spare time at the weekend.
app_sentences.cn: 我经常在周末的业余时间看书。

data.meaning: 更大声地说、大胆说出、无保留地说出

app_sentences.en: Please speak up; I can't hear you clearly at the back.
app_sentences.cn: 请大声点说；我在后面听不清你讲话。

app_sentences.en: Some deaf people use sign language to communicate with others.
app_sentences.cn: 一些失聪的人使用手语与他人交流。

app_sentences.en: The kind teacher uses sign language to teach the deaf students.
app_sentences.cn: 那位善良的老师用手语来教失聪的学生。

app_sentences.en: There is a tiny insect on the leaf of this flower.
app_sentences.cn: 这朵花的叶子上有一只很小的昆虫。

data.meaning: adj. 电的、导电的、电动的

app_sentences.en: My father uses an electric shaver every morning.
app_sentences.cn: 我爸爸每天早上使用电动剃须刀。

app_sentences.en: My father bought a new electric fan for the living room.
app_sentences.cn: 我爸爸为客厅买了一个新的电风扇。

app_sentences.en: Please turn off the light when you leave the classroom.
app_sentences.cn: 离开教室时请关灯。

app_sentences.en: We lit a candle when the electricity suddenly went out.
app_sentences.cn: 当电突然停了的时候，我们点了一支蜡烛。

app_sentences.en: The postman delivers letters and newspapers to our house every day.
app_sentences.cn: 邮递员每天给我们家送信和报纸。

app_sentences.en: The postman delivers letters and packages to our house every day.
app_sentences.cn: 邮递员每天把信件和包裹送到我们家。

data.meaning: n. 寒冷、[物]零下温度、伤风

app_sentences.en: The weather becomes very cold in winter, especially at night.
app_sentences.cn: 冬天天气变得非常冷，尤其是晚上。

app_sentences.en: It's very cold outside, so remember to wear your warm coat.
app_sentences.cn: 外面很冷，所以记得穿上你的保暖外套。

app_sentences.en: It is very cold outside, so remember to wear your coat.
app_sentences.cn: 外面很冷，所以记得穿上你的外套。

data.meaning: vt. 把...加热、使激动；vi. 加热、激昂、加剧；n. 热、热度、体温

app_sentences.en: The heat from the sun made the sand very warm.
app_sentences.cn: 太阳的热量使沙子变得很温暖。

app_sentences.en: The heat from the sun makes us feel warm in summer.
app_sentences.cn: 夏天，太阳的热量让我们感到温暖。

data.meaning: adj. 全部时间的、专任的

app_sentences.en: Her mother has a full-time job at a local hospital.
app_sentences.cn: 她妈妈在当地医院有一份全职工作。

data.meaning: vt. 提供、给予、供应得起

app_sentences.en: I saved my pocket money to afford this new dictionary.
app_sentences.cn: 我省下零花钱才买得起这本新词典。

app_sentences.en: He played the role of a brave knight in the school play.
app_sentences.cn: 他在学校话剧里扮演了一个勇敢的骑士。

app_sentences.en: A good education is very important for our future.
app_sentences.cn: 良好的教育对我们的未来非常重要。

data.meaning: n. 传送器、运输、运输机

app_sentences.en: Many students use bicycles as their main transport to school.
app_sentences.cn: 许多学生把自行车作为他们上学的主要交通工具。

app_sentences.en: We will set off for the park at seven tomorrow morning.
app_sentences.cn: 我们明天早上七点出发去公园。

data.meaning: n. 短袜、鞋内衬底、轻软鞋

app_sentences.en: I need to find a pair of clean socks for P.E. class.
app_sentences.cn: 我需要找一双干净的袜子上体育课。

data.meaning: conj. 无论何时、随时n.只要

app_sentences.en: You can call me whenever you need help with your homework.
app_sentences.cn: 无论何时你需要作业帮助，你都可以打电话给我。

data.meaning: adj. 适当的、正确的、固有的

app_sentences.en: Wearing proper clothes is necessary for the school trip.
app_sentences.cn: 为这次学校旅行，穿合适的衣服是必要的。

app_sentences.en: Be careful not to stand too close to the edge of the pool.
app_sentences.cn: 小心不要站得离游泳池边太近。

app_sentences.en: Please tell the class about yourself, like your name and hobby.
app_sentences.cn: 请告诉全班关于你自己的情况，比如你的名字和爱好。

app_sentences.en: You should learn to finish your homework by yourself.
app_sentences.cn: 你应该学会自己完成作业。

app_sentences.en: The alarm clock will go off at six thirty tomorrow morning.
app_sentences.cn: 闹钟会在明天早上六点半响起。

app_sentences.en: I'm starving; let's have lunch as soon as possible.
app_sentences.cn: 我快饿死了；我们尽快吃午饭吧。

app_sentences.en: We usually go to the library to study on Saturday afternoons.
app_sentences.cn: 我们通常在周六下午去图书馆学习。

app_sentences.en: He finished reading the short story in one go.
app_sentences.cn: 他一口气读完了那个短篇故事。

app_sentences.en: Children should not throw rocks at animals or people.
app_sentences.cn: 孩子们不应该向动物或人扔石头。

app_sentences.en: Rock climbing is an exciting but dangerous outdoor activity.
app_sentences.cn: 攀岩是一项刺激但危险的户外活动。

app_sentences.en: We skipped flat stones across the surface of the lake.
app_sentences.cn: 我们在湖面上打水漂。

app_sentences.en: There is a small stone bridge over the river near our village.
app_sentences.cn: 我们村附近的河上有一座小石桥。

data.meaning: adv. 公正地、正当的、公平对待某人

app_sentences.en: She is fairly good at drawing pictures of animals.
app_sentences.cn: 她画动物画得相当好。

data.meaning: adj. 平滑的、平坦的、平稳的

app_sentences.en: The surface of the new desk is very smooth and clean.
app_sentences.cn: 这张新桌子的表面非常光滑干净。

data.meaning: adj. 直的、诚实的、正直的

app_sentences.en: Go straight along this road, and you will see the post office.
app_sentences.cn: 沿着这条路直走，你就会看到邮局。

app_sentences.en: Go straight down this road and you will see the library on your left.
app_sentences.cn: 沿着这条路直走，你会看到左边的图书馆。

app_sentences.en: We slept in a tent during our camping trip last summer.
app_sentences.cn: 去年夏天露营时，我们睡在帐篷里。

app_sentences.en: Be careful not to fall on the wet floor in the hallway.
app_sentences.cn: 小心别在走廊潮湿的地板上摔倒。

app_sentences.en: Leaves turn yellow and fall from the trees in autumn.
app_sentences.cn: 秋天，树叶变黄并从树上落下。

app_sentences.en: He was so tired that he fell asleep during the movie.
app_sentences.cn: 他太累了，以至于在看电影时睡着了。

data.meaning: n. 悬挂的方式、(动作的)暂停、中止vt.悬挂

app_sentences.en: We hang our coats on the hooks behind the classroom door.
app_sentences.cn: 我们把外套挂在教室门后的挂钩上。

app_sentences.en: Please hang your coat on the hook behind the door.
app_sentences.cn: 请把你的外套挂在门后的钩子上。

app_sentences.en: A sudden noise from outside made the little girl very scared.
app_sentences.cn: 外面突然的响声让小女孩非常害怕。

app_sentences.en: Police officers sometimes carry a gun to protect people.
app_sentences.cn: 警察有时会携带枪支来保护人们。

data.meaning: adj. 软的、柔软的、温和的

app_sentences.en: My new pillow is very soft and comfortable to sleep on.
app_sentences.cn: 我的新枕头非常柔软，睡在上面很舒服。

app_sentences.en: The new pillow is very soft and comfortable to sleep on.
app_sentences.cn: 新枕头非常柔软，睡在上面很舒服。

data.meaning: n. 寂静、剧照、照片adj.静止的

app_sentences.en: It is raining, but I still want to go to the park with my friends.
app_sentences.cn: 天在下雨，但我仍然想和朋友们去公园。

app_sentences.en: Please sit still while the teacher is talking.
app_sentences.cn: 老师讲话时请安静地坐着别动。

app_sentences.en: The small house is made of wood and looks very old.
app_sentences.cn: 那座小房子是木制的，看起来非常古老。

app_sentences.en: This old table is made of strong and beautiful wood.
app_sentences.cn: 这张旧桌子是用坚固而美丽的木头制成的。

data.meaning: n. 血、血液、血统v.使(某人)先取得经验

app_sentences.en: The nurse took a little blood from his finger for the test.
app_sentences.cn: 护士从他的手指上取了一点血做化验。

data.meaning: 把...很快拾起、把...缠住；抓取程序

app_sentences.en: I need to study hard to catch up with my classmates in math.
app_sentences.cn: 我需要努力学习，在数学上赶上我的同学们。

app_sentences.en: After long discussion, they finally reached an agreement.
app_sentences.cn: 经过长时间的讨论，他们终于达成了一致。

app_sentences.en: After discussion, we finally came to an agreement on the plan.
app_sentences.cn: 讨论之后，我们终于就计划达成了一致。

data.meaning: adj. 瞎的、盲目的vt.使失明、缺乏眼光或判断力

app_sentences.en: The blind man walks across the street with the help of his dog.
app_sentences.cn: 那位盲人在他的狗的帮助下过马路。

app_sentences.en: The kind man has a blind dog that helps him cross the street.
app_sentences.cn: 这位善良的男子有一只导盲犬帮他过马路。

app_sentences.en: Ouch! I hit my knee on the corner of the desk.
app_sentences.cn: 哎哟！我的膝盖撞到桌角了。

app_sentences.en: They had to call off the picnic because of the bad weather.
app_sentences.cn: 因为天气不好，他们不得不取消了野餐。

app_sentences.en: Thanks to your help, I finished my project on time.
app_sentences.cn: 多亏了你的帮助，我按时完成了我的项目。

app_sentences.en: Good health care is important for everyone, especially the old.
app_sentences.cn: 良好的医疗保健对每个人都很重要，尤其是老人。

app_sentences.en: I expect to receive a good grade on my English test.
app_sentences.cn: 我期待英语考试能取得好成绩。

app_sentences.en: I expect to receive a birthday gift from my parents this year.
app_sentences.cn: 我期待今年能收到父母的一份生日礼物。

app_sentences.en: I expect to get a letter from my pen pal next week.
app_sentences.cn: 我期待下周能收到笔友的来信。

app_sentences.en: This job requires you to work for eight hours a day.
app_sentences.cn: 这份工作要求你每天工作八小时。

data.meaning: adj. 身体的、物质的、自然的

app_sentences.en: Physical exercise is good for both our body and mind.
app_sentences.cn: 体育锻炼对我们的身体和头脑都有好处。

app_sentences.en: With great effort, he finally solved the difficult problem.
app_sentences.cn: 通过巨大的努力，他终于解决了那个难题。

app_sentences.en: Once in a while, our family goes to the cinema on weekends.
app_sentences.cn: 偶尔，我们家会在周末去电影院。

data.meaning: vt. 伤害、损害n.伤害、损害

app_sentences.en: Smoking will harm your health, so please don't try it.
app_sentences.cn: 吸烟会损害你的健康，所以请不要尝试。

app_sentences.en: I received an invitation to Lucy's birthday party yesterday.
app_sentences.cn: 昨天我收到了露西生日派对的邀请。

app_sentences.en: I will invite all my classmates to my birthday party.
app_sentences.cn: 我会邀请我所有的同学来参加我的生日派对。

app_sentences.en: My best friend invited me to her house for dinner last Sunday.
app_sentences.cn: 上周日，我最好的朋友邀请我去她家吃晚饭。

app_sentences.en: There is a beautiful picture on the wall calendar in my room.
app_sentences.cn: 我房间的挂历上有一幅漂亮的图片。

app_sentences.en: The children were happy to see many colourful balloons at the party.
app_sentences.cn: 孩子们很高兴在聚会上看到许多彩色气球。

app_sentences.en: The children were playing with colourful balloons at the party.
app_sentences.cn: 孩子们在派对上玩着五颜六色的气球。

data.meaning: n. 油漆、颜料、涂料v.油漆

app_sentences.en: We will paint the fence white during the art class tomorrow.
app_sentences.cn: 明天美术课上我们要把栅栏漆成白色。

app_sentences.en: We will paint the wall blue to match the new furniture.
app_sentences.cn: 我们要把墙刷成蓝色来配新家具。

data.meaning: vt. 把...加热、使激动；vi. 加热、激昂、加剧；n. 热、热度、体温

app_sentences.en: The heat from the sun made the sand very warm.
app_sentences.cn: 太阳的热量使沙子变得很温暖。

app_sentences.en: The heat from the sun makes us feel warm in summer.
app_sentences.cn: 夏天，太阳的热量让我们感到温暖。

app_sentences.en: You can heat up the soup in the microwave for two minutes.
app_sentences.cn: 你可以用微波炉把汤加热两分钟。

app_sentences.en: Use the knife carefully to cut the apple into small pieces.
app_sentences.cn: 小心用刀把苹果切成小块。

app_sentences.en: Please be careful when you use a sharp knife in the kitchen.
app_sentences.cn: 在厨房里用锋利的刀时请务必小心。

app_sentences.en: Please be careful when you use a knife to cut the bread.
app_sentences.cn: 当你用刀切面包时请小心。

app_sentences.en: In Western countries, people usually eat with a knife and fork.
app_sentences.cn: 在西方国家，人们通常用刀叉吃饭。

app_sentences.en: She uses a spoon to eat soup and a fork to eat salad.
app_sentences.cn: 她用勺子喝汤，用叉子吃沙拉。

data.meaning: n. 夹干酪和碎牛肉的三明治、放有干酪的肉饼

app_sentences.en: I often order a cheeseburger and a cup of milk for lunch.
app_sentences.cn: 我午餐经常点一个芝士汉堡和一杯牛奶。

data.meaning: n. 意大利人、意大利语adj.意大利的、意大利语的

app_sentences.en: My father likes Italian food, especially pizza and pasta.
app_sentences.cn: 我爸爸喜欢意大利食物，尤其是披萨和意大利面。

data.meaning: n. 美国之西部的人、西方人

app_sentences.en: As a Westerner, he still enjoys learning Chinese history at school.
app_sentences.cn: 作为一个西方人，他仍然喜欢在学校学习中国历史。

data.meaning: n. 西方、西部adj.西的、西方的adv.向西方

app_sentences.en: The sun sets in the West at the end of the day.
app_sentences.cn: 太阳在一天结束时从西边落下。

app_sentences.en: We should learn to serve our community and help others.
app_sentences.cn: 我们应该学习服务社区、帮助他人。

app_sentences.en: The waiter will serve drinks and food to the customers.
app_sentences.cn: 服务员将为顾客端上饮料和食物。

app_sentences.en: The two houses look very similar because they were built together.
app_sentences.cn: 这两栋房子看起来非常相似，因为它们是一起建的。

app_sentences.en: Your new bicycle is similar to mine, but mine is blue.
app_sentences.cn: 你的新自行车和我的相似，但我的那辆是蓝色的。

app_sentences.en: The bird broke its wing and couldn't fly back to its nest.
app_sentences.cn: 那只鸟的翅膀受伤了，无法飞回它的巢。

app_sentences.en: The kind lady helped the lost boy find his parents.
app_sentences.cn: 那位善良的女士帮助迷路的小男孩找到了他的父母。

data.meaning: n. 阁下、先生、有身分的人

app_sentences.en: He is a true gentleman who always holds the door for others.
app_sentences.cn: 他是一位真正的绅士，总是为别人扶着门。

app_sentences.en: Please help yourself to some fruit on the table.
app_sentences.cn: 请随便吃点桌子上的水果。

app_sentences.en: Remember to look both ways before you cross the street.
app_sentences.cn: 过马路前记得左右看看。

app_sentences.en: With hard work, you can achieve your goals in life.
app_sentences.cn: 通过努力，你可以实现你的人生目标。

app_sentences.en: With enough practice, you can achieve your goal of swimming well.
app_sentences.cn: 通过足够的练习，你可以达到游好泳的目标。

app_sentences.en: All students, including those who are sick, must finish the homework.
app_sentences.cn: 所有学生，包括生病的那些，都必须完成作业。

app_sentences.en: Ten students, including me, joined the reading club.
app_sentences.cn: 包括我在内的十名学生加入了阅读俱乐部。

data.meaning: n. 说话者、演讲人、演说者

app_sentences.en: The guest speaker told us interesting stories about his travels.
app_sentences.cn: 特邀演讲者给我们讲了他旅行的有趣故事。

app_sentences.en: Her boss is very strict but also fair to all the workers.
app_sentences.cn: 她的老板非常严格，但对所有工人也很公平。

app_sentences.en: The school secretary answers phone calls and helps visitors.
app_sentences.cn: 学校秘书接听电话并帮助来访者。

data.meaning: n. 四分之一、[常 pl.] 方向、地区

app_sentences.en: A quarter of the students in our class like playing basketball.
app_sentences.cn: 我们班四分之一的学生喜欢打篮球。

app_sentences.en: It's a quarter past seven; we have fifteen minutes before class.
app_sentences.cn: 现在是七点一刻；我们离上课还有十五分钟。

app_sentences.en: This city is famous for its car industry and technology.
app_sentences.cn: 这座城市以其汽车工业和技术而闻名。

app_sentences.en: The temperature dropped to zero degrees last night.
app_sentences.cn: 昨晚气温降到了零度。

data.meaning: adj. 印度的、印度人的、印第安人的n.印度人

app_sentences.en: My neighbour is Indian, and she sometimes cooks delicious curry.
app_sentences.cn: 我的邻居是印度人，她有时会做美味的咖喱。

app_sentences.en: What type of music do you like to listen to, pop or rock?
app_sentences.cn: 你喜欢听什么类型的音乐，流行乐还是摇滚乐？

app_sentences.en: She put her keys and phone into her small handbag.
app_sentences.cn: 她把钥匙和手机放进了她的小手提包里。

data.meaning: n. 敲打、拍子、巡逻区域v.打

app_sentences.en: You need to beat the eggs well before you make the cake.
app_sentences.cn: 做蛋糕前你需要把鸡蛋打好。

app_sentences.en: Our school basketball team beat their team in the final game.
app_sentences.cn: 我们学校的篮球队在决赛中打败了他们队。

data.meaning: vt. 原谅、宽恕n.原谅、宽恕

app_sentences.en: Pardon? Could you please repeat the question more slowly?
app_sentences.cn: 抱歉？你能请慢点重复一遍那个问题吗？

app_sentences.en: I intend to visit my grandparents during the summer holiday.
app_sentences.cn: 我打算暑假期间去看望我的祖父母。

app_sentences.en: Could you please fetch me a glass of water from the kitchen?
app_sentences.cn: 你能请从厨房给我拿一杯水来吗？

app_sentences.en: I like to eat pancakes with honey for breakfast on Sundays.
app_sentences.cn: 我喜欢在星期天早餐吃煎饼配蜂蜜。

app_sentences.en: My mother makes delicious pancakes for us on Sunday mornings.
app_sentences.cn: 我妈妈在星期天早上为我们做好吃的薄煎饼。

data.meaning: n. 蔷薇属、玫瑰、玫瑰红

app_sentences.en: My mother likes red roses very much, so I bought her some.
app_sentences.cn: 我妈妈非常喜欢红玫瑰，所以我给她买了一些。

app_sentences.en: He gave his mother a beautiful red rose on her birthday.
app_sentences.cn: 他在母亲生日时送了她一朵美丽的红玫瑰。

app_sentences.en: It's not polite to laugh at others when they make mistakes.
app_sentences.cn: 当别人犯错时嘲笑他们是不礼貌的。

app_sentences.en: We should always show kindness to animals and people in need.
app_sentences.cn: 我们应该永远对动物和有需要的人表现出善意。

data.meaning: 放弃、停止、献出；放弃、停止、把...送交

app_sentences.en: Don't give up easily when you face difficulties in learning.
app_sentences.cn: 当你在学习中遇到困难时不要轻易放弃。

app_sentences.en: Don't give up easily when you face difficulties.
app_sentences.cn: 当你面对困难时不要轻易放弃。

app_sentences.en: You should try your best to finish the task on time.
app_sentences.cn: 你应该尽力按时完成任务。

app_sentences.en: She was very disappointed because she failed the history test.
app_sentences.cn: 她非常失望，因为她历史考试没及格。

data.meaning: n. 床旁adj.床旁的、枕边的

app_sentences.en: There is a lamp and a clock on my bedside table.
app_sentences.cn: 我的床头柜上有一盏灯和一个闹钟。

data.meaning: n. 笔记、短信、(外交)照会

app_sentences.en: I wrote a note to remind myself about the meeting after school.
app_sentences.cn: 我写了一张便条提醒自己放学后开会。

app_sentences.en: I left a note on the fridge to remind my brother about the meeting.
app_sentences.cn: 我在冰箱上留了张便条提醒我弟弟开会的事。

app_sentences.en: My mother left a note on the table to remind me.
app_sentences.cn: 我妈妈在桌子上留了张纸条提醒我。

app_sentences.en: Whom did you invite to your birthday party last weekend?
app_sentences.cn: 上周末你邀请了谁参加你的生日派对？
